pr_title: issue #877 add max_prepared_transactions in user guide for postgresql

timeline.message:
Merge pull request #962 from IBM/issue--955

merge master

issue #877 add max_prepared_transactions in userguide for postgresql

Signed-off-by: Albert Wang <xuwang@us.ibm.com>

issue #877 minor update

Signed-off-by: Albert Wang <xuwang@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Note: If you use Apache PostgreSql database as FHIR data store or JavaBatch job repository, please enable max_prepared_transactions in postgresql.conf, otherwise the import/export JavaBatch jobs will fail.
          
          
            
            Note: If you use PostgreSQL database as IBM FHIR Server data store or the JavaBatch job repository, please enable `max_prepared_transactions` in postgresql.conf, otherwise the import/export JavaBatch jobs fail.
timeline.author: prb112
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1296,6 +1296,8 @@ psql -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -1 -U javabatch -f batchPersistence-postgresql.ddl -d jo
 </server>
 ```
 
+Note: If you use Apache PostgreSql database as FHIR data store or JavaBatch job repository, please enable max_prepared_transactions in postgresql.conf, otherwise the import/export JavaBatch jobs will fail.

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think PostgreSQL is an apache project.
Also, I think we should use the proper casing wherever possible:  its PostgreSQL.
All lowercase is probably also acceptable in some cases.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Note: If you use Apache PostgreSql database as FHIR data store or JavaBatch job repository, please enable max_prepared_transactions in postgresql.conf, otherwise the import/export JavaBatch jobs will fail.
          
          
            
            Note: If you use a PostgreSQL database as FHIR data store or JavaBatch job repository, please enable max_prepared_transactions in postgresql.conf, otherwise the import/export JavaBatch jobs will fail.
timeline.author: lmsurpre
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1296,6 +1296,8 @@ psql -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -1 -U javabatch -f batchPersistence-postgresql.ddl -d jo
 </server>
 ```
 
+Note: If you use Apache PostgreSql database as FHIR data store or JavaBatch job repository, please enable max_prepared_transactions in postgresql.conf, otherwise the import/export JavaBatch jobs will fail.
